text: UAllâh nguYe Othumela imimoya, khon’ukuze iphakamise amafu iwasasaze esibhakabhakeni ngohlobo Athande ngalo, ize iwahlulahlule abe ziingqimba, ude ubone amachaphaza emvula ephuma phakathi kuwo! Aze (amachaphaza lawo) athi esakuwela kwabo (uAllâh) Athande ukuba awele phezu kwabo kwizicaka zaKhe, bavuye
